verses.roman:
tabe bhaṭṭācārya sei brāhmaṇe lañā
yukti karilā kichu nibhṛte vasiyā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; bhaṭṭācārya—Bhaṭṭācārya; sei brāhmaṇe—the Sanoḍiyā brāhmaṇa; lañā—taking; yukti karilā—consulted; kichu—something; nibhṛte vasiyā—sitting in a solitary place.
translation: After this, Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya took the Sanoḍiyā brāhmaṇa to a secluded place and consulted with him.
